verses.text: \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to me, ye that follow \w after|strong="H7291"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, ye that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w look|strong="H5027"\w* unto the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \add whence\add* ye are \w hewn|strong="H2672"\w*, and to the \w hole|strong="H4718"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* \add whence\add* ye are \w digged|strong="H5365"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H5027"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* your \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and unto \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \add that\add* \w bare|strong="H2342"\w* you: for I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him \w alone|strong="H0259"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* him, and \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* him.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: he will \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* all her waste \w places|strong="H2723"\w*; and he will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* her \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* like \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*, and her \w desert|strong="H6160"\w* like the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* shall be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* therein, \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w melody|strong="H2172"\w*.

¶ \w Hearken|strong="H7181"\w* unto me, my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto me, O my \w nation|strong="H3816"\w*: for a \w law|strong="H8451"\w* shall \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* from me, and I will make my \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* to \w rest|strong="H7280"\w* for a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

My \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*; my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* is gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and mine \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* shall \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* upon me, and on mine \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* shall they \w trust|strong="H3176"\w*.

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w look|strong="H5027"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath: for the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* shall vanish \w away|strong="H4414"\w* like \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall wax \w old|strong="H1086"\w* like a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, and they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w manner|strong="H3654"\w*: but my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* shall be for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* shall not be \w abolished|strong="H2865"\w*.

¶ \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, ye that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*; \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye not the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, neither be ye \w afraid|strong="H2865"\w* of their \w revilings|strong="H1421"\w*.

For the \w moth|strong="H6211"\w* shall eat them \w up|strong="H0398"\w* like a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, and the \w worm|strong="H5580"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* them like \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*: but my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* shall be for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

¶ \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, O \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, as in the \w ancient|strong="H6924"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, in the \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*. \add Art\add* thou not it that hath \w cut|strong="H2672"\w* \w Rahab|strong="H7294"\w*, \add and\add* \w wounded|strong="H2490"\w* the \w dragon|strong="H8577"\w*?

\add Art\add* thou not it which hath \w dried|strong="H2717"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*; that hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* the \w depths|strong="H4615"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* for the \w ransomed|strong="H1350"\w* to pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*?

Therefore the \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with \w singing|strong="H7440"\w* unto \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; and \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \add shall be\add* upon their \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: they shall \w obtain|strong="H5381"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8342"\w* and \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*; \add and\add* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* and \w mourning|strong="H0585"\w* shall flee \w away|strong="H5127"\w*.

I, \add even\add* I, \add am\add* he that \w comforteth|strong="H5162"\w* you: who \add art\add* thou, that thou shouldest be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \add that\add* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add which\add* shall be \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \add as\add* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*;

And \w forgettest|strong="H7911"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w maker|strong="H6213"\w*, that hath stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and laid the \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and hast \w feared|strong="H6342"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* of the \w oppressor|strong="H6693"\w*, as \w if|strong="H0834"\w* he were \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*? and where \add is\add* the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* of the \w oppressor|strong="H6693"\w*?\f + \fr 51.13 \ft were…: or, made himself ready\f*

The captive \w exile|strong="H6808"\w* \w hasteneth|strong="H4116"\w* that he may be \w loosed|strong="H6605"\w*, and that he should not \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, nor that his \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* should \w fail|strong="H2637"\w*.

But I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that \w divided|strong="H7280"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, whose \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* \w roared|strong="H1993"\w*: The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And I have \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and I have \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* thee in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that I may \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and lay the \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, stand \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which hast \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* at the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of his \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; thou hast \w drunken|strong="H8354"\w* the \w dregs|strong="H6907"\w* of the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of \w trembling|strong="H8653"\w*, \add and\add* wrung \add them\add* \w out|strong="H4680"\w*.

\add There is\add* none to \w guide|strong="H5095"\w* her among all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add whom\add* she hath brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*; neither \add is there any\add* that \w taketh|strong="H2388"\w* her by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add that\add* she hath brought \w up|strong="H1431"\w*.

These \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add things\add* are \w come|strong="H7122"\w* unto thee; who shall be \w sorry|strong="H5110"\w* for thee? \w desolation|strong="H7701"\w*, and \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*, and the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: by whom shall I \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* thee?\f + \fr 51.19 \ft are…: Heb. happened\f*\f + \fr 51.19 \ft destruction: Heb. breaking\f*

Thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* have \w fainted|strong="H5968"\w*, they \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* at the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of all the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*, as a wild \w bull|strong="H8377"\w* in a \w net|strong="H4364"\w*: they are \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
¶ Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* now this, thou \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*, and \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*, but not with \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add that\add* \w pleadeth|strong="H7378"\w* the cause of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Behold, I have taken \w out|strong="H3947"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of \w trembling|strong="H8653"\w*, \add even\add* the \w dregs|strong="H6907"\w* of the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; thou shalt no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* drink it \w again|strong="H8354"\w*:

But I will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* it into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w afflict|strong="H3013"\w* thee; which have \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, Bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w*, that we may go \w over|strong="H5674"\w*: and thou hast \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w body|strong="H1460"\w* as the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and as the \w street|strong="H2351"\w*, to them that went \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.
